target_markets.market_description: Photographers using Lightroom for photo editing
target_markets.market_size_indicators: tons of search volume for X Lightroom preset keywords
80% of billboards are personal injury lawyers, indicating large market

problems_validated.problem: Photographers constantly need new Lightroom presets but current marketplace is fragmented and expensive
problems_validated.current_solutions: Buying individual preset packs from photographers
problems_validated.market_gap: No subscription-based AI-powered preset generation service

products_tools.name: AI Lightroom Preset Generator
products_tools.use_case: Generate custom Lightroom presets from uploaded photos using AI

products_tools.name: Lightroom
products_tools.use_case: Photo editing software that uses XML presets

business_strategies.strategy: Convert one-time preset purchases into subscription revenue model
business_strategies.implementation: Build AI tool that generates presets on-demand, offer subscription access
business_strategies.expected_results: Recurring revenue instead of one-time sales
business_strategies.case_study: Similar to SVG subscription model mentioned previously

business_strategies.strategy: Domain portfolio strategy for SEO lead generation
business_strategies.implementation: Buy 1000 exact match domains for longtail keywords, create WordPress sites, funnel to main service
business_strategies.expected_results: Rank #1 on Google for specific search terms
business_strategies.case_study: Personal injury lawyers using rank and rent model

business_strategies.strategy: Rank and rent model for lead generation
business_strategies.implementation: Build SEO sites for high-value keywords, rent leads to businesses, eventually sell domains
business_strategies.expected_results: Recurring revenue from lead rental, potential asset sale
business_strategies.case_study: Law firms buying domain portfolios as assets

problems_solutions.problem: Photographers need custom Lightroom presets but buying individual packs is expensive and limited
problems_solutions.solution: AI-powered preset generation from uploaded reference photos

problems_solutions.problem: High cost of PPC advertising for competitive keywords
problems_solutions.solution: Build owned media assets through exact match domains

startup_ideas.target_market: Professional photographers, wedding photographers, content creators
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Expensive, limited preset marketplace with no customization options
startup_ideas.validation: High search volume for preset keywords, existing market of preset sellers

growth_tactics.results_expected: Direct access to target photographer audience

growth_tactics.tactic: Exact match domain strategy for longtail keywords
steps: Funnel traffic to main subscription service

steps: AI analyzes photo aesthetic and style

metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Focus on subscription retention over acquisition costs
